text:
[Verse]
Engine roars alive
In this midnight drive
City lights go by
Under the starlit sky

[Verse]
Windows down we glide
Feel the world collide
Radio's our guide
In this endless ride

[Chorus]
Midnight drive let's go
Through the streets we know
With the music's flow
We lose track of time's shadow

[Bridge]
Tires kiss the lane
Night's our sweet domain
Heartbeats sync like rain
In this night we reign

[Verse]
Passing shadows blur
Dreams begin to stir
Peace in what we were
Now we're freer than ever

[Chorus]
Midnight drive let's go
Through the streets we know
With the music's flow
We lose track of time's shadow
title: Midnight Drive
